observation: Navigating to https://www.lsggroup.com/ returned status code 200

Financial Advisor in Austin, TX | Lucien, Stirling & Gray  Our Values How We Serve You Meet the Team Resources Client Secure Portal Back Important Disclosures Quarterly Reports Scroll Chart a course for your financial future. Professional Financing Advisor in Austin, TX We’ll help navigate whatever waters lie ahead. Life is an expedition into the unfamiliar and the unknown. With the right financial advisor “Counsel woven into the fabric of real life is wisdom.” Walter Benjamin A Personalized Financial Planning Path Our approach to wealth management places the emphasis on your own unique journey through life—and how to prepare for the expected and the unexpected circumstances that lie ahead. Our financial lives are full of changes—some pleasant, and some not so much.  Marriage, divorce, children, grandchildren, career changes, inheritance, retirement, and death—all of these will impact your financial needs and choices. Having a trusted financial advisor builds confidence, relieves anxiety, and helps you adjust to life’s challenges with courage and hope. How? By helping you focus on the things you can control, by protecting your best interests, and by providing you sound, caring, dependable counsel during times of transition. Behavioral Coaching Money and emotions are deeply intertwined. Your long-term success with money and life will hinge on your behavior and the decisions you make. In times of challenge and change, disciplined leadership, personal attention, and sound financial principles that encourage you to act with more confidence will add to your sense of resilience. You’ll sleep better at night with the conviction that wealth and well-being, in all its forms, can become a meaningful part of your legacy. We take a holistic approach, not one focused solely on your investments and financial transactions. Ours is a life-centered, not simply a portfolio-centered, value proposition. “The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.” William Arthur Ward Are we a good fit? It’s important that you find the right financial planner Most of our clients fall into one of four categories: Retired individuals and couples Professional accumulators Independent women Business owners Our ideal clients are: Fiscally conservative Prudent investors, Thoughtful delegators Contact us Form CRS Lucien, Stirling & Gray Advisory Group, Inc. Subscribe to our Monthly Newsletter First Name Last Name Email Address Subscribe Thank you! Established 1992 | We are an independent, Austin-owned, Fee-Only, Registered Investment Advisory firm located in central Austin.
